txt.en: <rgb=#00FF00>We have dealt with the horn-blowing scouts at last.</rgb>
Keep scouts from blowing their horns three times.
Haradrim scouts have spotted us and blown a warning horn. We should stop them before they wind the third blow.
<rgb=#FF0000>The horn has blown thrice! The signal for reinforcements has gone out!</rgb>

Corsair scouts have snuck up from behind and spotted our position. If they can get off three blows of their horn, reinforcements will come running!

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Merit Gain:</rgb>
* Defeat scouts before third horn-blow 
  (with as few horn-blows as possible)
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow all the hornblowers to alert reinforcements.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Failure: All the scouts succeeded in winding their horns!</rgb>
